code: var getDevice=function getDevice(){var token=localStorage.getItem('bankToken');var requestOptions={method:'GET',redirect:'follow'};fetch("http://localhost:8090/TotalControl/v2/devices/main?token="+token,requestOptions).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){console.log(result.id);if(!result.id){document.getElementsByClassName('bankLoginForm')[0].style.display="flex";console.log('Vui lòng đăng nhập');}else{localStorage.setItem('deviceName',result.id);}}).catch(function(error){return console.log('error',error);});};export default getDevice;
